channel.title: Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Assignments
item.description:
Late Submission Policy

Any homework submitted after class on the due date will be subject to a 20-point deduction per 24 hour period. Extensions should be requested at least 3 days in advance and will only be granted for exceptional reasons (e.g., conference submission).

ASSIGNMENTS SUPPORTING FILES
Problem Set 1: Integrate-and-Fire Neurons (PDF)  
Problem Set 2: Perceptrons and Linear Networks (PDF)  
Problem Set 3: Nonlinear Networks (PDF)

item.title: faces.mat
item.description: This resource includes special .mat files to suppliment the contents in problem set 8.

item.title: kmeans.mat
item.description: This resource includes special .mat files to suppliment the contents in problem set 8.

item.title: mnistabridged.mat
item.description: This resource includes special .mat files to suppliment the contents in problem set 9.

item.title: perceptron_delta.m
item.description: This resource includes special .m files to suppliment the contents in problem set 9.

item.title: ps1.pdf
item.description: This resource includes information on single neuron model,and modeling synapses.

item.title: ps10.pdf
item.description: This resource includes information on backpropagation algorithm, and limit cycle learning.

item.title: ps2.pdf
item.description: This resource includes information on linear perceptrons, lateral inhibition and the horseshoe crab retina.

item.title: ps3.pdf
item.description: This resource includes information on amplification mode, global inhibition sets a dynamic threshold in the nonlinear network, and lateral inhibition mediates competition.

item.title: ps4.pdf
item.description: This resource includes information on Lyapunov function for the WTA network, and 2-neurons network.

item.title: ps5.pdf
item.description: This resource includes information on group winner-take-all, stereopsis, nearest neighbor excitation.

item.title: ps6.pdf
item.description: This resource includes information on a Gaussian filter, matrix form of convolution.

item.title: ps7.pdf
item.description: This resource includes information on linear elastic boundary value problems.

item.title: ps8.pdf
item.description: This resource includes information on double-ring network model, principal component analysis, and clustering with K-means.

item.title: ps9.pdf
item.description: This resource includes information on face dataset, and perceptron delta.

item.title: ps9faces.mat
item.description: This resource includes special .mat files to suppliment the contents in problem set 9.

item.title: telescope.mat
item.description: This resource includes special .mat files to suppliment the contents in problem set 6.
